price: Ako gacimbiri rero Twahanye, Twakagize inkebuzo yotuma uducimbiri two mu micungararo n’utuzokurikira mu nyuma tudasubira gukoresha urwenge mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa, Tukagira n’inyigisho ku bagamburukiramana babayeho ico gihe n’inyuma y’aho.
arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا نَكَٰلٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهَا وَمَا خَلۡفَهَا وَمَوۡعِظَةٗ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalnāhā nakālan limā bayna yadayhā wamā khalfahā wamawʿiẓatan lil'muttaqīna
